purpose: To provide developers with a flexible and high-performance chat UI for creating real-time chat applications.
principle: Built using the Flutter framework, leveraging Dart for cross-platform UI development.
reusability: Easily integrated into Flutter projects as a widget, highly customizable with various UI components.
limitations: Limited to applications built with Flutter; customization requires familiarity with Flutter and Dart.
name: flutter_chat_ui
description: Free and open-source chat SDK. Build fast, real-time apps and generative AI agents with a high-performance, customizable, cross-platform UI.
highlight: High-performance, customizable chat UI for building real-time apps across multiple platforms.
